rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with a ramp and handrails. Minimalistic reception area aligning with Vastu principles for welcoming positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan space with an industrial look featuring exposed brick finishes and metal accents. Includes a central seating area that overlooks the courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with industrial style dining table and chairs. Large windows for natural light as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Functional modern kitchen integrated into the living area. Designed with accessibility in mind and industrial finishes.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open central courtyard acting as an inviting communal space. Features water element for cooling and positive energy circulation according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated indoor gym with accessibility modifications including adjustable equipment heights and wheelchair-accessible exercise stations. Industrial finishes match the overall design.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet study area with built-in bookshelves and adjustable lighting for reading. Placed in a serene corner as per Vastu to promote knowledge and introspection.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Designed with accessibility in mind, including wider doorways and grab bars.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Adjacent bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort, also wheelchair accessible with space for mobility aids.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to be spacious and accessible, incorporating storage solutions.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: General bathroom located near the bedrooms. Accessible design with non-slip floors and grab bars as per guidelines.
